name: advice
trans: n. 建议；忠告；劝告；通知

sentences.english: You should have followed my advice.
sentences.chinese: 你真该听我的建议。

detailed_translations.english: an opinion you give someone about what they should do

name: colony
trans: n. 殖民地；移民队；种群；动物栖息地

sentences.english: Algeria was formerly a French colony.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔及利亚以前是法国的殖民地。

detailed_translations.english: a country or area that is under the political control of a more powerful country, usually one that is far away

name: independent
trans: adj. 独立的；单独的；无党派的；不受约束的 n. 独立自主者；无党派者

sentences.english: There are plans to split the corporation into a number of smaller independent companies.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要把这家大企业分割成一些独立的小公司。

sentences.english: an independent charity
sentences.chinese: 独立的慈善机构

sentences.english: small independent bookshops
sentences.chinese: 私营小书店

sentences.english: schools in the independent sector
sentences.chinese: 私立学校

detailed_translations.english: an independent organization is not owned or controlled by, or does not receive money from, another organization or the government

name: politics
trans: n. 政治，政治学；政治活动；政纲

sentences.english: I assume her politics must be fairly conservative.
sentences.chinese: 我猜她的政治观点一定相当保守。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s political beliefs and opinions

name: bridle
trans: n. 缰绳；马勒；系带；约束物 vt. 控制；给装马勒 vi. 昂首表示轻蔑；生气 n. (Bridle)人名；(英)布赖德尔

sentences.english: The metal mouthpiece of a bridle, serving to control, curb, and direct an animal.
sentences.chinese: 马勒， 嚼子放在嘴里的金属制马勒，用于控制约束和驾御牲畜。

sentences.english: Inadvertently the paper added a comma to the ad, which read instead:Horse, saddle and bridle for $50.
sentences.chinese: 无意中报纸在广告语中加了个逗号，读起来成这样了，50元卖马，马鞍和马缰绳。

sentences.english: These included a saddle, bridle, clay vase, wooden bowl, trough, iron kettle, the remains of an entire horse, and ancient clothing.
sentences.chinese: 这些物品包括一个鞍，缰绳，黏土花瓶，木碗，饲料槽，铁壶，一整匹马的遗骸以及一件古老的衣服。

detailed_translations.chinese: 上笼头； 昂首 ； 抑制
detailed_translations.english: to put a bridle on a horse
a set of leather bands put around a horse’s head and used to control its movements

name: current
trans: adj. 现在的；流通的，通用的；最近的；草写的 n. （水，气，电）流；趋势；涌流 n. (Current)人名；(英)柯伦特

sentences.english: the current President
sentences.chinese: 现任总统

sentences.english: In its current state, the car is worth £1,000.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车按现在的车况来看值1,000英镑。

detailed_translations.english: happening or existing now

name: instrument
trans: n. 仪器；工具；乐器；手段；器械 v. 给……装测量仪器

sentences.english: surgical instruments
sentences.chinese: 外科(手术)器械

detailed_translations.chinese: 仪器， 工具； 乐器
detailed_translations.english: a small tool used in work such as science or medicine

name: inventor
trans: n. 发明家；[专利] 发明人；创造者

sentences.english: Alexander Graham Bell, the inventor of the telephone
sentences.chinese: 亚历山大·格雷厄姆·贝尔，电话的发明者

detailed_translations.english: someone who has invented something, or whose job is to invent things

name: parafoil
trans: n. 翼伞

name: shock
trans: n. 休克；震惊；震动；打击；禾束堆 vt. 使休克；使震惊；使震动；使受电击；把…堆成禾束堆 vi. 感到震惊；受到震动；堆成禾束堆 adj. 浓密的；蓬乱的 n. (Shock)人名；(英)肖克

sentences.english: The hatred in her voice shocked him.
sentences.chinese: 她语气中的仇恨让他震惊。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel very surprised and upset, and unable to believe what has happened

name: disease
trans: n. 病，[医] 疾病；弊病 vt. 传染；使…有病

sentences.english: His father died of heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲死于心脏病。

sentences.english: She contracted the disease while she was abroad on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 她在国外度假时染上了这种疾病。

detailed_translations.chinese: 病， 疾病； 不健全， 弊端
detailed_translations.english: an illness which affects a person, animal, or plant

name: inhaler
trans: n. [临床] 吸入器；空气过滤器；吸入者

name: mist
trans: n. 薄雾；视线模糊不清；模糊不清之物 vi. 下雾；变模糊 vt. 使模糊；使蒙上薄雾

sentences.english: We could just see the outline of the house through the mist.
sentences.chinese: 薄雾中我们只能看到房子的轮廓。

sentences.english: He vanished into the mist.
sentences.chinese: 他消失在雾中。

sentences.english: The hills were shrouded in mist (= covered in mist, so that you could not see them ) .
sentences.chinese: 山峦笼罩在雾霭之中。

sentences.english: The mist came down off the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 雾从山上飘下来。

sentences.english: The mists rolled in off the sea (= came on to the land from the sea ) .
sentences.chinese: 雾气从海上涌来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 薄雾；视线模糊不清；模糊不清之物
detailed_translations.english: a light cloud low over the ground that makes it difficult for you to see very far

name: symptom
trans: n. [临床] 症状；征兆

sentences.english: One of the most common symptoms of schizophrenia is hearing imaginary voices.
sentences.chinese: 精神分裂症最常见的症状之一是幻听。

detailed_translations.english: something wrong with your body or mind which shows that you have a particular illness

name: trigger
trans: n. 扳机；起因，引起反应的事；触发器，引爆装置 v. 触发，引起；开动（装置） n. (Trigger) 特里杰（人名）

sentences.english: He took aim and squeezed the trigger.
sentences.chinese: 他瞄准目标，扣动了扳机。

sentences.english: The assassination triggered off a wave of rioting.
sentences.chinese: 这次暗杀事件引发了一阵骚乱。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a gun that you pull with your finger to fire it
to make something happen very quickly, especially a series of events

name: wheeze
trans: v. 喘息；喘息地说出；气喘吁吁地走动；（器械）气喘似的响 n. 喘息声；（非正式）巧妙主意；（不再好笑的）过时笑话

sentences.english: He had serious problems with his chest and wheezed and coughed all the time.
sentences.chinese: 他胸部有严重问题，总是不停地气喘和咳嗽。

detailed_translations.english: If someone wheezes, they breathe with difficulty and make a whistling sound

name: antennae
trans: n. [电讯] 天线（等于aerial）；[昆] 触须；[植] 蕊喙；直觉

name: communicate
trans: vi. 通讯，传达；相通；交流；感染 vt. 传达；感染；显露

sentences.english: We communicated mostly by e-mail.
sentences.chinese: 我们主要是用电子邮件沟通。

sentences.english: A baby communicates its needs by crying.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿用哭来表达需要。

detailed_translations.english: to exchange information or conversation with other people, using words, signs, writing etc

name: insect
trans: n. 昆虫；卑鄙的人

sentences.english: an insect bite
sentences.chinese: 昆虫的叮咬

sentences.english: flying insects
sentences.chinese: 飞虫

sentences.english: Don’t forget to bring insect repellant (= a chemical to keep insects away ).
sentences.chinese: 不要忘记带上驱虫剂。

detailed_translations.english: a small creature such as a fly or ant, that has six legs, and sometimes wings

name: species
trans: n. [生物] 物种；种类 adj. 物种上的

sentences.english: Seven species of birds of prey have been observed.
sentences.chinese: 已有七种猛禽被观察到。

sentences.english: pandas and other endangered species
sentences.chinese: 熊猫以及其他濒危物种

detailed_translations.english: a group of animals or plants whose members are similar and can breed together to produce young animals or plants

name: vibration
trans: n. 振动；犹豫；心灵感应

sentences.english: the vibrations from the earthquake
sentences.chinese: 地震引起的震动

sentences.english: The microscope must be free from vibration.
sentences.chinese: 显微镜一定要避免震动。

detailed_translations.english: a continuous slight shaking movement

name: developing
trans: adj. 发展中的；生长的，变化的 n. 发展 v. 发展；成长；产生；感受；使（摄影胶片）显影（develop 的现在分词）

name: digest
trans: vt. 消化；吸收；融会贯通 vi. 消化 n. 文摘；摘要

sentences.english: Most babies can digest a wide range of food easily.
sentences.chinese: 大多数婴儿能轻易地消化很多种食物。

sentences.english: I struggled to digest the news.
sentences.chinese: 我费力地琢磨着那条新闻。

sentences.english: a monthly news digest
sentences.chinese: 每月新闻摘要

detailed_translations.english: to change food that you have just eaten into substances that your body can use
a short piece of writing that gives the most important facts from a book, report etc

name: infected
trans: adj. （身体部位或伤口）受感染的；（食品、水等）受细菌污染的；（计算机或磁盘）受病毒感染的 v. （受）传染（infect 的过去式和过去分词 ）

sentences.english: an infected finger
sentences.chinese: 受感染的手指

sentences.english: Clean the wound so it doesn’t get infected.
sentences.chinese: 清洗伤口以免感染。

detailed_translations.english: a part of your body or a wound that is infected has harmful bacteria in it which prevent it from healing

name: mattress
trans: n. 床垫；褥子；空气垫

sentences.english: The ten young people sleep between two hard, narrow beds and one large mattress on the floor with no privacy at all.
sentences.chinese: 十个年轻人就睡在两张窄小的硬板床和地板上的一张大床垫上，没有任何隐私可言。

sentences.english: If someone pokes fun at your mattress on the floor, or teases you about your empty cabinets, smile and take it in stride.
sentences.chinese: 如果有人取笑你放在地板上的床垫，或揶揄你空空的橱柜，请面带微笑从容应对此事。

sentences.english: She laid a spring mattress under the sheet.
sentences.chinese: 她在床单下面铺了一个弹簧床垫。

detailed_translations.english: the soft part of a bed that you lie on

name: suitcase
trans: n. [轻] 手提箱；衣箱

sentences.english: It did not take Andrew long to pack a suitcase.
sentences.chinese: 安德鲁没有用多长时间就整理好了手提箱。

detailed_translations.english: a large case with a handle, used for carrying clothes and possessions when you travel

name: victim
trans: n. 受害人，牺牲品，牺牲者；受骗者，上当的人；祭品，牺牲；无助者，被动者

sentences.english: The victim received head injuries from which she died a week later.
sentences.chinese: 受害人头部受伤，一周后死亡。

sentences.english: a credit card fraud ring that stole millions of dollars from unsuspecting victims
sentences.chinese: 从毫无戒心的受害者手中盗取数百万美元的信用卡诈骗团伙

detailed_translations.english: someone who has been attacked, robbed, or murdered

name: balance
trans: n. 平衡；余额；匀称 vt. 使平衡；结算；使相称 vi. 保持平衡；相称；抵销 n. (Balance)人名；(西)巴兰塞

sentences.english: She balanced the cup on her knee.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子在膝盖上放稳。

detailed_translations.english: to put your body or sth else into a position where it is steady and does not fall
an instrument for weighing things, with two dishes that hang from a bar

name: compass
trans: n. 指南针，罗盘；圆规 vt. 包围

sentences.english: a map and compass
sentences.chinese: 地图和指南针

detailed_translations.english: an instrument that shows directions and has a needle that always points north

name: echo
trans: vt. 反射；重复 vi. 随声附和；发出回声 n. 回音；效仿

sentences.english: Her scream was followed by a loud echo.
sentences.chinese: 她的尖叫声过后是响亮的回声。

sentences.english: ‘He's gone! ’ Viv echoed.
sentences.chinese: “他去了！”维夫重复道。

detailed_translations.english: a sound that you hear again after a loud noise, because it was made near something such as a wall
to repeat what someone else has just said

name: sensor
trans: n. 传感器

sentences.english: The latest Japanese vacuum cleaners contain sensors that detect the amount of dust and type of floor.
sentences.chinese: 日本最新款吸尘器装有传感器，能测出灰尘量和地板类型。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment used for discovering the presence of light, heat, movement etc

name: attention
trans: n. 注意力；关心；立正！（口令）

sentences.english: My attention wasn’t really on the game.
sentences.chinese: 我的注意力其实不在比赛上。

sentences.english: She tried to pay attention to what he was saying.
sentences.chinese: 她尽量注意听他说话。

sentences.english: If you paid more attention in class, you might actually learn something!
sentences.chinese: 要是你上课更认真些，也许能实实在在地学到些东西！

sentences.english: Scott sat down at his desk and turned his attention to the file he had in front of him.
sentences.chinese: 斯科特在自己的办公桌前坐下，将注意力转向面前的文件。

sentences.english: As a society we need to give more attention to the needs of older people.
sentences.chinese: 生活在同一社会里，我们得更加关注长者的需求。

sentences.english: Now he’s gone, I can give you my undivided attention .
sentences.chinese: 现在他已经走了，我可以把全部注意力都放在你身上。

sentences.english: This game is fun and is sure to keep the attention of any young student.
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏很有趣，一定能使年幼学生保持注意力。

sentences.english: They listened to the speech with close attention .
sentences.chinese: 他们很认真地听演讲。

sentences.english: Attention to detail is essential in this job.
sentences.chinese: 关注细节是这份工作所必需的。

sentences.english: During the lecture Sarah’s attention began to wander .
sentences.chinese: 上课时，萨拉开始走神了。

detailed_translations.english: when you carefully listen to, look at, or think about someone or something

name: congratulations
trans: n. 祝贺；恭喜；贺词（congratulation的复数形式）

sentences.english: The club also offers its congratulations to D. Brown on her appointment as president.
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部还就布朗被任命为会长一事向她表示了祝贺。

detailed_translations.english: If you offer someone your congratulations, you congratulate them on something nice that has happened to them or on something good that they have done

name: distracted
trans: v. （使）分心；转移（注意力）；（使）困惑（distract 的过去式及过去分词） adj. 注意力分散的；心烦意乱的

sentences.english: She had seemed curiously distracted.
sentences.chinese: 她不知为什么显得心不在焉。

detailed_translations.english: anxious and unable to think clearly

name: frustration
trans: n. 挫折

sentences.english: There are moments when he feels great frustration and it bursts out of him.
sentences.chinese: 会有这样的时刻:当他感觉很好挫折和它爆发出来了。

sentences.english: Your frustration could be an indication that you just need some input or assistance.
sentences.chinese: 你的挫折可能是在暗示你只是需要一些意见或援助。

sentences.english: But before you give up, I’d like you to ask yourself what your frustration is telling you.
sentences.chinese: 但是，在你放弃之前，我希望你能问下自己，你的挫折在向你传达着怎样的讯息。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of being prevented from achieving what you are trying to achieve

name: mutter
trans: vi. 咕哝；喃喃自语 vt. 咕哝；抱怨地说；低声含糊地说 n. 咕哝；喃喃低语 n. (Mutter)人名；(法)米泰；(德、匈、西)穆特；(英)马特

sentences.english: Elsie muttered something I couldn’t catch and walked off.
sentences.chinese: 埃尔茜咕哝了一句什么，我也没有听懂，她就走掉了。

sentences.english: ‘He’s such an unpleasant man,’ Alyssia muttered under her breath .
sentences.chinese: “他真是个讨厌的人。”阿莉西娅轻声嘟囔着。

detailed_translations.english: to speak in a low voice, especially because you are annoyed about something, or you do not want people to hear you

name: point
trans: n. 要点；得分；标点；[机] 尖端 vt. 指向；弄尖；加标点于 vi. 表明；指向 n. (Point)人名；(法)普安

sentences.english: The party's share of the vote fell by ten percentage points.
sentences.chinese: 该党的得票率下跌了十个百分点。

sentences.english: Here are the main points of the news.
sentences.chinese: 以下是新闻摘要。

sentences.english: There are three important points we must bear in mind.
sentences.chinese: 有三个要点我们必须记住。

sentences.english: He is three points behind the leader.
sentences.chinese: 他落后领先者三分。

detailed_translations.english: a mark or unit on a scale of measurement

name: cargo
trans: n. 货物，船货 n. (Cargo)人名；(英、西)卡戈

sentences.english: a cargo plane
sentences.chinese: 货机

detailed_translations.english: the goods that are being carried in a ship or plane

name: legend
trans: n. 传奇；说明；图例；刻印文字 n. (Legend)人名；(西)莱亨德；(英)莱金德

sentences.english: Local legend has it that (= says that ) the island was the original Garden of Eden.
sentences.chinese: 当地传说这个岛就是伊甸园的原型。

detailed_translations.english: an old, well-known story, often about brave people, adventures, or magical events

name: pirate
trans: n. 海盗，海上劫掠者；盗版者，侵犯专利权者；非法制作电视或广播节目的人（或组织）；道德败坏者，违法者 v. 盗印，窃用；劫掠（船只）；劫掠（船只） adj. 盗版的

sentences.english: Computer game pirates cost the industry twenty million pounds a year.
sentences.chinese: 电脑游戏盗版者每年要给该行业带来两千万英镑的损失。

detailed_translations.chinese: 海盗；盗版；侵犯专利权者
detailed_translations.english: someone who sails on the seas, attacking other boats and stealing things from them
to illegally copy and sell another person’s work such as a book, video, or computer program

name: privateer
trans: n. 私掠船；武装民船；私掠船船长；私掠船船员 vi. 私掠巡航

name: sail
trans: vi. 航行；启航，开船 n. 帆，篷；航行 vt. 航行

sentences.english: a yacht with white sails
sentences.chinese: 扬着白帆的游艇

sentences.english: The trawler had sailed from the port of Zeebrugge.
sentences.chinese: 那只拖网渔船已经从泽布吕赫港启航。

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of strong cloth fixed onto a boat, so that the wind will push the boat along
to travel on or across an area of water in a boat or ship

name: treasure
trans: n. 财富，财产；财宝；珍品 vt. 珍爱；珍藏 n. (Treasure)（英、美、爱）特雷热（人名）

sentences.english: buried treasure
sentences.chinese: 埋藏的财宝

sentences.english: the priceless art treasures of the Uffizi gallery.
sentences.chinese: 乌菲齐美术馆收藏的无价艺术瑰宝

sentences.english: I treasure his friendship.
sentences.chinese: 我珍重他的友谊。

detailed_translations.english: a collection of valuable things such as gold, silver and jewellery
to keep and care for something that is very special, important, or valuable to you

name: bouncy
trans: adj. 有弹性的；快活的；精神饱满的；自大的

name: brainstorm
trans: n. 集思广益；头脑风暴；灵机一动 vt. 集体讨论；集思广益以寻找 vi. 集体讨论；动脑筋；出主意

sentences.english: While some of the greatest ideas and solutions come up in brainstorm meetings, we also lose most of our time in discussion without action.
sentences.chinese: 当在头脑风暴的会议上有一些顶级的主意或者解决方法提出时，我们也浪费了很多时间在没有行动的讨论上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 集思广益；头脑风暴；灵机一动
集体讨论；集思广益以寻找

name: moat
trans: n. 护城河；壕沟 vt. 将...围以壕沟

sentences.english: Certainly no one in the media would deny the attraction of living behind a deep moat, even if it is filled with sharks.
sentences.chinese: 当然，在媒体业，没有人会否认围在深深的护城河里面过日子的吸引力，即使那河里满是鲨鱼在游来游去。

sentences.english: The bridge lies like a trench in the fortress of the moat, which is shaped to blend in with the outlines of the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 这座桥就像是坐落在护城河中的一条沟渠，这种造型是为了使它与周围的风景融合在一起。

sentences.english: It's a shame our particular moat, the ashram of Pray, is so exhausting, because in the Love section Bardem proves himself a worthy castle.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾，我们急缺实际的护城河，祈祷的场所，因为在爱这部分里，巴登证明了自己就是一座有价值的城堡。

detailed_translations.english: a deep wide hole, usually filled with water, dug around a castle as a defence

name: sketch
trans: n. 素描；略图；梗概 vt. 画素描或速写 vi. 画素描或速写 n. (Sketch)人名；(英)斯凯奇

sentences.english: So if we just sketch that.
sentences.chinese: 那么如果我们把那画个草图。

sentences.english: He squiggled a sketch on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 他在地上胡乱地画了个草图。

detailed_translations.english: a simple, quickly made drawing that does not show much detail
a short humorous scene on a television programme, in a theatre etc, that is part of a larger show

name: trail
trans: n. 足迹；（跟踪某人的）踪迹；（尤指细长）一缕；（人或动物）排成的长队；（荒野）小路；特定路线；滑雪坡；（炮架的）架尾；（电影等的）预告片 v. 拖，拉；（尤指植物）蔓延；（尤指根据痕迹等）追踪；（在游戏、比赛中）落后；拖沓行走；（声音、喇叭）减弱；预告（影片、节目等）；喷注（泥釉） n. (Trail) （美）特雷尔（人名）

sentences.english: The trail led over Boulder Pass before descending to a lake.
sentences.chinese: 小路越过博尔德山口，然后向下通往湖边。

sentences.english: The bus left a trail of black smoke behind it.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车开过，留下一股黑烟。

sentences.english: Police trailed the gang for several days.
sentences.chinese: 警察跟踪了那个团伙好几天。

detailed_translations.english: a rough path across countryside or through a forest
to follow someone by looking for signs that they have gone in a particular direction

name: trampoline
trans: n. 蹦床；弹簧垫

name: buffalo
trans: n. [畜牧][脊椎] 水牛；[脊椎] 野牛（产于北美）；水陆两用坦克 n. (Buffalo)人名；(英)布法罗 vt. 威胁; 欺骗; 迷惑

sentences.english: The hunter trailed the wounded buffalo through the bush.
sentences.chinese: 猎人在灌木丛中追踪那只受伤的美洲野牛。

sentences.english: To remind American citizens to protect the environment, the government issued this buffalo nickel.
sentences.chinese: 为了提醒美国公民保护环境，政府就发行了这种野牛镍币。

sentences.english: Humans then may develop living communities where the deer, buffalo, elk and bear, or elephant, giraffe and hippo freely roam again.
sentences.chinese: 或许有一天，人类会组织生活社区，在那里鹿、野牛、麋鹿、熊、大象、长颈鹿和河马会再一次自由倘佯。

detailed_translations.english: an African animal similar to a large cow with long curved horns

name: sacred
trans: adj. 神的；神圣的；宗教的；庄严的

sentences.english: a sacred vow
sentences.chinese: 神圣的誓言

sentences.english: the miraculous powers of sacred relics
sentences.chinese: 圣物的神奇力量

sentences.english: Certain animals were considered sacred.
sentences.chinese: 有些动物被认为是神圣的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 神的；神圣的；宗教的；庄严的
detailed_translations.english: relating to a god or religion

name: stampede
trans: n. 惊跑；人群的蜂拥；军队溃败 vi. 蜂拥；逃窜 vt. 使…惊逃；抢占

sentences.english: a herd of stampeding buffalo
sentences.chinese: 一群狂奔的水牛

detailed_translations.english: to be made frightened or worried so that you do something too quickly, without thinking enough about it

detailed_translations.chinese: 逃窜， 狂奔； 热潮， 风尚
detailed_translations.english: when a group of large animals or people suddenly start running in the same direction because they are frightened or excited

name: surround
trans: vt. 围绕；包围 n. 围绕物 adj. 环绕立体声的

sentences.english: He glared at the people who surrounded the tent.
sentences.chinese: 他怒视着围住帐篷的那些人。

detailed_translations.english: to be all around someone or something on every side

name: swiftest
trans: 最快速的

name: larva
trans: n. [水产] 幼体，[昆] 幼虫 n. (Larva)人名；(芬、捷)拉尔瓦

sentences.english: The eggs quickly hatch into larvae.
sentences.chinese: 这些卵很快孵化成幼虫。

detailed_translations.english: a young insect with a soft tube-shaped body, which will later become an insect with wings

name: mate
trans: n. 助手，大副；配偶；同事；配对物 vt. 使配对；使一致；结伴 vi. 交配；成配偶；紧密配合 n. (Mate)人名；(日)蛏(姓)；(西、意、塞)马特；(波黑)马特；(罗、俄)马泰

sentences.english: He has found his ideal mate.
sentences.chinese: 他已经找到了理想的配偶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 助手，大副；配偶；同事；配对物
detailed_translations.english: someone you work with, do an activity with, or share something with
if animals mate, they have sex to produce babies

name: molting
trans: n. [动] 蜕皮；换羽 v. 脱毛；换羽（molt的ing形式）

name: pupa
trans: n. [昆] 蛹 n. (Pupa)人名；(意)普帕

name: stage
trans: n. 阶段；舞台；戏剧；驿站 vt. 举行；上演；筹划 vi. 举行；适于上演；乘驿车旅行 n. (Stage)人名；(英)斯特奇

sentences.english: We’re getting to the stage where we hardly ever go out together.
sentences.chinese: 我们快要到几乎不一起外出的地步了。

sentences.english: She is on stage for most of the play.
sentences.chinese: 这出戏的大部分时间里她都在台上

detailed_translations.english: a particular time or state that something reaches as it grows or develops

name: ancestor
trans: n. 始祖，祖先；被继承人

sentences.english: My ancestors were French.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖先是法国人。

detailed_translations.english: a member of your family who lived a long time ago

name: celebration
trans: n. 庆典，庆祝会；庆祝；颂扬

sentences.english: the lively New Year celebrations in the city centre
sentences.chinese: 市中心热闹的新年庆祝活动

detailed_translations.english: an occasion or party when you celebrate something

name: Sukkoth
trans: n. 犹太结茅节（犹太教的收割节）

name: synagogue
trans: n. 犹太教会堂；犹太人集会

sentences.english: And he reasoned in the synagogue every sabbath, and persuaded the Jews and the Greeks.
sentences.chinese: 每逢安息日，保罗在会堂里辩论，劝化犹太人和希腊人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 犹太教会堂；犹太人集会
detailed_translations.english: a building where Jewish people meet for religious worship

name: tortoise
trans: n. 龟，[脊椎] 乌龟（等于testudo）；迟缓的人

sentences.english: I saw a big sea tortoise .
sentences.chinese: 我看见过一个大海龟。

sentences.english: Run like a tortoise.
sentences.chinese: 像乌龟一样慢慢跑。

sentences.english: Either way, both the hare and tortoise get what they deserve based on how they behave.
sentences.chinese: 无论如何，野兔和乌龟得到什么都是基于它们的行为举止的。

detailed_translations.english: a slow-moving land animal that can pull its head and legs into the hard round shell that covers its body

name: yam
trans: n. 山药 甘薯 白薯

sentences.english: And we went into the poisonous giant tubers, like the yam and the taro, which also had to be leeched, ground up and cooked before we could eat them.
sentences.chinese: 我们也寻找到了那些带有毒性的、个头颇大的块茎，像山药、芋头，这些在食用之前得经过榨取、提炼和烹饪。

detailed_translations.english: a tropical climbing plant grown for its root, which is eaten as a vegetable

name: fit
trans: vt. 安装；使……适应；使……合身；与……相符 vi. 符合，配合；适合；合身 adj. 健康的；合适的；恰当的；准备好的 n. 合身；发作；痉挛 n. (Fit)人名；(捷、罗)菲特

sentences.english: The sash, kimono, and other garments were made to fit a child.
sentences.chinese: 这些腰带、和服和其他衣服都做得适合孩子穿。

detailed_translations.english: to put a piece of equipment into a place, or a new part onto a machine, so that it is ready to be used
if something fits another thing, it is similar to it or suitable for it

name: hearth
trans: n. 灶台；炉边；炉床；壁炉地面 n. (Hearth)人名；(英)哈思

sentences.english: It was winter and there was a huge fire roaring in the hearth.
sentences.chinese: 时值冬天，壁炉里的炉火在熊熊燃烧。

detailed_translations.english: the area of floor around a fireplace in a house

name: maiden
trans: n. 少女，处女；未婚女子；（板球比赛中）未得分的一轮投球；从未跑赢过的赛马 adj. （尤指年纪较大女性）未婚的；处女的；（航行、飞行)）首次的；（赛马）从未跑赢过的；（植物）生长期第一年内的 n. (Maiden) （美）每田（人名）

sentences.english: In 1912, the Titanic sank on her maiden voyage.
sentences.chinese: 1912年，泰坦尼克号首次航行时沉没。

detailed_translations.english: The maiden voyage or flight of a ship or aircraft is the first official journey that it makes
a young girl, or a woman who is not married

name: slipper
trans: n. 拖鞋 vt. 用拖鞋打

sentences.english: No slipper is allowed in the laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 不应在实验室穿著拖鞋。

sentences.english: The boy ran away with the big slipper though she was begging.
sentences.chinese: 那个男孩不管她怎么哀求，还是拿着那只大拖鞋跑开了。

sentences.english: My foot was rather sore, but I managed to ease it into a large slipper.
sentences.chinese: 我的脚很疼，不过我很小心地把它伸进一只大拖鞋里。

detailed_translations.english: a light soft shoe that you wear at home

name: twig
trans: n. 小枝，嫩枝，末梢；血管小支 v. （非正式）顿悟；（古）察觉

sentences.english: There is the bird, sitting on a twig halfway up the tree.
sentences.chinese: 鸟儿在那里，栖息在树中段的一根细枝上。

detailed_translations.english: to understand (something)
a small very thin stem of wood that grows from a branch on a tree

name: wish
trans: v. 希望，但愿；盼望，想要；祝，祝愿；祈愿，许愿；（印度英语）问候；要求（某人）做某事 n. 希望，愿望；祈求，心愿；祝愿，祝福；想要的东西，希望的事；请求，要求 n. (Wish) （美）威什（人名）

sentences.english: Close your eyes and make a wish.
sentences.chinese: 闭上眼睛许个愿。

detailed_translations.english: a desire to do something, to have something, or to have something happen
to want something to be true although you know it is either impossible or unlikely

name: animation
trans: n. 活泼，生气；激励；卡通片绘制

sentences.english: 3-D animations
sentences.chinese: 三维动画片

detailed_translations.chinese: 活泼，生气；激励；卡通片绘制
detailed_translations.english: liveliness and excitement

name: coding
trans: n. 译码 v. 把…编码（code的ing形式）

name: counselor
trans: n. 顾问；法律顾问；参事（等于counsellor）

sentences.english: The counselor bounced up to denounce discount.
sentences.chinese: 顾问上升蹦跳指责折扣。

sentences.english: The next day as I was talking to my financial counselor he gave me advice on how I might avoid running out of money.
sentences.chinese: 隔天，当我跟我的理财顾问谈话时，他也提出建议，告诉我如何避免金钱耗尽。

sentences.english: What about using that background and talent in a different field, say as an admissions counselor for a nearby college or university?
sentences.chinese: 将你的资历和才能用在别的行业会怎么样呢？ 比如说去当附近一所大学或学院的招生顾问。

name: crash
trans: v. 碰撞；（使）坠毁；（使）摔碎；使发出巨响；（金融企业等）破产；（机器、系统等）崩溃；（比赛中）惨败；（在临时安排的地方）入睡；心脏停止跳动；擅自闯入 n. （交通工具）坠毁；碰撞声；暴跌；（机器、系统的）崩溃；睡觉；粗棉布 adj. 应急的，速成的 adv. 哗啦一声地

sentences.english: We watched the waves crashing against the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着海浪哗啦哗啦地冲击岩石。

sentences.english: The plates went crashing to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 盘子哗啦一声摔落到地上。

sentences.english: A large branch came crashing down .
sentences.chinese: 一根大树枝啪啦一声掉落下来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 倒下，坠落；发出撞击声；垮台，破产
detailed_translations.english: to hit something or someone extremely hard while moving, in a way that causes a lot of damage or makes a lot of noise
to have an accident in a car, plane etc by violently hitting something else
a sudden loud noise made by something falling, breaking etc

name: design
trans: n. 设计；构思；设计图样；装饰图案；打算 v. 设计，构思；计划；制造，意欲 n. (Design) （巴、印、俄）迪赛（人名）

sentences.english: The tower was designed by Gilbert Scott.
sentences.chinese: 这座塔楼是吉尔伯特·斯科特设计的。

detailed_translations.english: to make a drawing or plan of something that will be made or built

detailed_translations.chinese: 设计， 构想； 图样； 企图
detailed_translations.english: the art or process of making a drawing of something to show how you will make it or what it will look like

name: file
trans: n. 文件；档案；文件夹；锉刀 vt. 提出；锉；琢磨；把…归档 vi. 列队行进；用锉刀锉 n. (File)人名；(匈、塞)菲莱

sentences.english: We will keep your details on file (= store them for later use ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们将把你的详细资料存档。

sentences.english: The contracts are filed alphabetically.
sentences.chinese: 这些合同是按字母顺序归档的。

detailed_translations.english: a set of papers, records etc that contain information about a particular person or subject
to keep papers, documents etc in a particular place so that you can find them easily

name: dandelion
trans: n. 蒲公英

sentences.english: The wind puffed away the seeds of the dandelion.
sentences.chinese: 风吹散了蒲公英的种子。

sentences.english: It looks like the head of a dandelion seed, you know, with all the lollipops coming out of it, and with a center in it, that we started out as the tweet.
sentences.chinese: 它看起来像蒲公英的花朵，你知道的，从花朵中飞出的所有棒棒糖一样的种子都有一个中心，正如我们首发的那条微博。

detailed_translations.english: a wild plant with a bright yellow flower which later becomes a white ball of seeds that are blown away in the wind

name: hedgerow
trans: n. 灌木篱墙

sentences.english: He crouched behind a low hedgerow.
sentences.chinese: 他蹲在一排低矮的灌木篱后面。

detailed_translations.english: a line of bushes growing along the edge of a field or road

name: leprechaun
trans: n. （爱尔兰民间传说中的）小妖精

name: suspicion
trans: n. 怀疑；嫌疑；疑心；一点儿 vt. 怀疑

sentences.english: I can’t say for definite who did it, but I certainly have my suspicions .
sentences.chinese: 我不能确切说是谁干的，但我肯定有怀疑的对象。

sentences.english: Police suspicions were confirmed when the stolen property was found in his flat.
sentences.chinese: 失窃物品在他公寓里找到，警方的怀疑得到了证实。

sentences.english: I wondered how I could leave early without arousing anyone’s suspicions .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道怎么才能早点离开而又不引起别人的怀疑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 怀疑， 疑心， 猜疑； 一点儿， 少量
detailed_translations.english: a feeling you have that someone is probably guilty of doing something wrong or dishonest

name: algae
trans: n. [植] 藻类；[植] 海藻

sentences.english: ...an effort to control toxic algae in Green Lake.
sentences.chinese: …控制绿湖里有毒水藻的努力。

detailed_translations.english: a very simple plant without stems or leaves that grows in or near water

name: fragile
trans: adj. 脆的；易碎的

sentences.english: The economy remains extremely fragile.
sentences.chinese: 经济仍然极其脆弱。

sentences.english: Her father is now 86 and in fragile health.
sentences.chinese: 她的父亲现在86岁，身体虚弱。

detailed_translations.english: weak and uncertain; easily destroyed or spoilt

name: polyp
trans: n. 息肉；珊瑚虫；水螅虫

name: skeleton
trans: n. 骨架，骨骼；纲要；骨瘦如柴的人 adj. 骨骼的；骨瘦如柴的；概略的

sentences.english: We agreed on a skeleton outline of the proposal.
sentences.chinese: 我们给提案商定了一个基本框架。

detailed_translations.chinese: 骨架，骨骼；纲要；骨瘦如柴的人
detailed_translations.english: the most important parts of something, to which more detail can be added later

detailed_translations.chinese: 骨骼的；骨瘦如柴的；概略的

name: collision
trans: n. 碰撞；冲突；（意见，看法）的抵触；（政党等的）倾轧

sentences.english: Two people were killed in a head-on collision (= between two vehicles that are moving directly towards each other ) on highway 218.
sentences.chinese: 218号公路上有两辆汽车迎面相撞，两人死亡。

sentences.english: a collision between the two countries over fishing rights
sentences.chinese: 两国为捕鱼权而发生的冲突

detailed_translations.english: an accident in which two or more people or vehicles hit each other while moving in different directions

name: endangered
trans: adj. 濒临灭绝的；有生命危险的

sentences.english: I think there are many endangered animals in the world, such as tigers and pandas.
sentences.chinese: 我认为有许多濒临灭绝的动物，如老虎和大熊猫，在世界。

sentences.english: I think our government should punish those people severely who kill the rare animals. It is our duty to protect the endangered animals.
sentences.chinese: 我认为政府应该严厉惩罚那些捕杀稀有动物的人。保护濒临灭绝的动物是我们的责任。

sentences.english: However, it holds six language families, two of which have only one remaining language, and almost all of the languages here are endangered.
sentences.chinese: 然而，它拥有六个语族，其中两个语族仅剩下一种语言，而且这儿几乎所有的语言都濒临灭绝。

detailed_translations.chinese: 濒危的， 将要灭绝的

name: extinction
trans: n. 灭绝；消失；消灭；废止

sentences.english: species in danger of extinction
sentences.chinese: 有灭绝危险的物种

sentences.english: They were hunted almost to extinction.
sentences.chinese: 它们遭受猎杀，几近灭绝。

sentences.english: Conservationists are trying to save the whale from extinction.
sentences.chinese: 生态环境保护工作者正努力挽救鲸类以防止其灭绝。

detailed_translations.english: when a particular type of animal or plant stops existing

name: habitat
trans: n. [生态] 栖息地，产地 n. (Habitat)人名；(德)哈比塔特

sentences.english: watching monkeys in their natural habitat
sentences.chinese: 观察自然生活环境中的猴子

sentences.english: The grassland is an important habitat for many wild flowers.
sentences.chinese: 这片草原是很多野花的重要生长地。

detailed_translations.english: the natural home of a plant or animal

name: migrate
trans: vi. 移动；随季节而移居；移往 vt. 使移居；使移植

sentences.english: People migrate to cities like Jakarta in search of work.
sentences.chinese: 人们移居到雅加达这样的城市找工作。

sentences.english: Most birds have to fly long distances to migrate.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的鸟类不得不飞行很长的距离进行迁徙。

detailed_translations.english: if people migrate, they go to live in another area or country, especially in order to find work

name: vehicle
trans: n. [车辆] 车辆；工具；交通工具；运载工具；传播媒介；媒介物

sentences.english: a description of the stolen vehicle
sentences.chinese: 对被盗车辆的描述

sentences.english: Have you locked your vehicle?
sentences.chinese: 你锁车了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a machine with an engine that is used to take people or things from one place to another, such as a car, bus, or truck

name: equal
trans: adj. 平等的；相等的；胜任的 vt. 等于；比得上 n. 对手；匹敌；同辈；相等的事物

sentences.english: Both candidates received an equal number of votes.
sentences.chinese: 两位候选人的得票数相等。

sentences.english: I’m not sure he’s equal to the task.
sentences.chinese: 我不确定他是否能胜任这项任务。

sentences.english: He treats all his staff as equals.
sentences.chinese: 他对所有员工都一视同仁。

sentences.english: Two plus two equals four.
sentences.chinese: 二加二等于四。

detailed_translations.english: the same in size, number, amount, value etc as something else
someone who is as important, intelligent etc as you are, or who has the same rights and opportunities as you do
to be exactly the same in size, number, or amount as something else

name: fourth
trans: adj. 第四的，第四个的；四分之一的 n. 第四，月的第四日；四分之一 num. 第四

sentences.english: the fourth of July
sentences.chinese: 7月4日

sentences.english: one-fourth/three-fourths

detailed_translations.english: the fourth thing in a series
¼; one of four equal parts

name: glide
trans: vi. 滑翔；滑行；悄悄地走；消逝 vt. 使滑行；使滑动 n. 滑翔；滑行；滑移；滑音

sentences.english: Waiters glide between tightly packed tables bearing trays of pasta.
sentences.chinese: 侍者们托着一盘盘的意大利面食在拥挤的餐桌间自如穿行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 滑翔；滑行；悄悄地走；消逝
detailed_translations.english: to move smoothly and quietly, as if without effort
a smooth quiet movement that seems to take no effort

name: half
trans: n. 一半；半场；半学年 adv. 一半地；部分地 adj. 一半的；不完全的；半途的 n. (Half)人名；(阿拉伯)哈勒夫；(德)哈尔夫；(英)哈夫

sentences.english: Two halves make a whole.
sentences.chinese: 两个一半构成一个整体。

sentences.english: Only half the guests had arrived by seven o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 7点钟前只来了一半客人。

sentences.english: If you look at our members, at least half are women.
sentences.chinese: 看看我们的会员，至少有一半是女性。

sentences.english: ...a half measure of fresh lemon juice.
sentences.chinese: …半量杯的新鲜柠檬汁。

detailed_translations.english: one of two equal parts of something
exactly or about 50% (1/2) of an amount, time, distance, number etc

name: swoop
trans: v. 俯冲；突然袭击；（尤指鸟）猛扑；（非正式）猛地抓起 n. 猛扑；突然袭击

sentences.english: The eagle hovered, ready to swoop at any moment.
sentences.chinese: 鹰在天空盘旋，随时准备俯冲下来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 猛扑；突然袭击；突然下降；飞扑
detailed_translations.english: if a bird or aircraft swoops, it moves suddenly down through the air, especially in order to attack something
a sudden surprise attack on a place in order to get something or take people away – used especially in news reports

name: law
trans: n. 法律；规律；法治；法学；诉讼；司法界 vi. 起诉；控告 vt. 控告；对…起诉 n. (Law)人名；(东南亚国家华语)刘；(英、缅、柬)劳

sentences.english: Elected officials ought to obey the law.
sentences.chinese: 民选官员理应遵守法律。

sentences.english: laws passed by Parliament
sentences.chinese: 议会通过的法律

detailed_translations.english: the whole system of rules that people in a particular country or area must obey

name: memorial
trans: n. 纪念碑，纪念馆；纪念仪式；纪念物 adj. 记忆的；纪念的，追悼的

sentences.english: A memorial service is being held for her at St. Paul's Church.
sentences.chinese: 一场为她举行的纪念仪式正在圣保罗教堂举行。

sentences.english: The hospital was built as a memorial to King Edward VII.
sentences.chinese: 该医院是为了纪念国王爱德华七世而建的。

detailed_translations.english: done or made in order to remind people of someone who has died
something, especially a stone with writing on it, that reminds people of someone who has died

name: peaceful
trans: adj. 和平的，爱好和平的；平静的

sentences.english: We had a peaceful afternoon without the children.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们不在，我们度过了一个宁静的下午。

sentences.english: It’s very peaceful out here in the woods.
sentences.chinese: 这树林里真安静。

sentences.english: the use of nuclear power for peaceful purposes
sentences.chinese: 核能的和平利用

detailed_translations.english: a peaceful time, place, or situation is quiet and calm without any worry or excitement

name: racism
trans: n. 种族主义，种族歧视；人种偏见

sentences.english: The government has promised to continue the fight against racism.
sentences.chinese: 政府已承诺继续打击种族歧视。

sentences.english: the problem of racism in schools
sentences.chinese: 学校里的种族歧视问题

detailed_translations.chinese: 种族主义，种族歧视；人种偏见
detailed_translations.english: unfair treatment of people, or violence against them, because they belong to a different race from your own

name: segregated
trans: adj. 被隔离的 v. 隔离（segregate的过去式）；分离

name: deed
trans: n. 行动；功绩；证书；[法] 契据 vt. 立契转让

sentences.english: After the morning’s good deeds he deserved a rest.
sentences.chinese: 上午做了好事之后，他理应休息一下。

sentences.english: She tried to strangle her baby and her lover helped her finish the evil deed .
sentences.chinese: 她试图掐死自己的宝宝，她的情人帮着完成了这个罪恶的勾当。

detailed_translations.chinese: 行动；功绩；证书；[法] 契据
detailed_translations.english: something someone does, especially something that is very good or very bad

name: goods
trans: n. 商品；动产；合意的人；真本领

sentences.english: a goods train
sentences.chinese: 一列货车

sentences.english: the large market for consumer goods
sentences.chinese: 庞大的消费品市场

sentences.english: Britain’s leading exporter of manufactured goods
sentences.chinese: 英国主要的工业制成品出口商

sentences.english: There will be tax increases on a range of goods and services .
sentences.chinese: 有一些商品和服务将要增税。

detailed_translations.english: things which are carried by road, train etc

name: insist
trans: vt. 坚持，强调 vi. 坚持，强调

sentences.english: Stay for supper – I insist!
sentences.chinese: 留下来吃晚餐——一定的！

detailed_translations.english: to demand that something should happen

name: musician
trans: n. 音乐家

sentences.english: a talented young musician
sentences.chinese: 有天赋的年轻音乐家

detailed_translations.english: a person who plays a musical instrument or writes music, especially as a job

name: roti
trans: n. （印度及加勒比海域的）烙饼，烤饼；（印度）面包（尤指在圆形烤盘上烤的扁平圆面包） n. (Roti) （美）罗蒂（人名）

name: altar
trans: n. 祭坛；圣坛；圣餐台 n. (Altar)人名；(法、塞、罗)阿尔塔

sentences.english: a crucifix above the high altar
sentences.chinese: 主圣坛上方的耶稣受难像

sentences.english: The victim was tied to a sacrificial altar.
sentences.chinese: 牺牲被绑在祭坛上。

detailed_translations.english: a holy table or surface used in religious ceremonies

name: cemetery
trans: n. 墓地；公墓

sentences.english: Her father was laid in a cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 她父亲安葬在一处公墓。

sentences.english: The body was interred at that cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 尸体下葬在那个公墓。

sentences.english: He rests in a cemetery in the western suburbs of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 他长眠于北京西郊的一个公墓中。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of land, usually not belonging to a church, in which dead people are buried

name: culture
trans: n. 文化，文明；修养；栽培 vt. [细胞][微] 培养（等于cultivate）

sentences.english: We speak Danish at home so that the boys don’t lose touch with their language and culture.
sentences.chinese: 我们在家说丹麦语，这样男孩子们就不会脱离他们的语言和文化。

sentences.english: In our culture, it is rude to ask someone how much they earn.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的文化里，问别人收入多少是不礼貌的。

sentences.english: I love working abroad and meeting people from diffe-rent cultures.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在国外工作，认识来自不同文化的人。

detailed_translations.english: the beliefs, way of life, art, and customs that are shared and accepted by people in a particular society

name: honor
trans: n. 荣誉；信用；头衔 vt. 尊敬（等于honour）；给…以荣誉

sentences.english: For the French team, winning tomorrow’s game is a matter of national honor.
sentences.chinese: 对法国队来说，打赢明天的比赛事关国家荣誉。

detailed_translations.english: the respect that you, your family, your country etc receive from other people, which makes you feel proud

name: spirit
trans: n. 精神；心灵；情绪；志气；烈酒 vt. 鼓励；鼓舞；诱拐

sentences.english: His spirits were so low (= he was so sad ) that he refused to answer his phone.
sentences.chinese: 他情绪非常低落，连电话也不愿接。

detailed_translations.chinese: 精神；心灵；情绪；志气；烈酒
detailed_translations.english: the qualities that make someone live the way they do, and make them different from other people

name: tradition
trans: n. 惯例，传统；传说

sentences.english: the traditions of South East Asia
sentences.chinese: 东南亚的传统

sentences.english: the tradition that the eldest son inherits the property
sentences.chinese: 长子继承家产的传统

sentences.english: By tradition, it’s the bride’s parents who pay for the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 根据传统习俗，婚礼的费用由新娘的父母承担。

detailed_translations.english: a belief, custom, or way of doing something that has existed for a long time, or these beliefs, customs etc in general

name: gas
trans: n. 气体；[矿业] 瓦斯；汽油；毒气 vt. 加油；毒（死） vi. 加油；放出气体；空谈 n. (Gas)人名；(法、德、西)加斯

sentences.english: hydrogen gas
sentences.chinese: 氢气

sentences.english: Can you light the gas for me?
sentences.chinese: 你帮我点燃煤气好吗？

sentences.english: I probably spend over 200 a month on gas.
sentences.chinese: 我一个月大概要花200多美元汽油钱。

detailed_translations.english: a substance such as air, which is not solid or liquid, and usually cannot be seen

name: glacier
trans: n. 冰河，冰川

sentences.english: The glacier calved a large iceberg.
sentences.chinese: 冰川崩解而产生一个大冰山。

sentences.english: The glacier dislocated great stones.
sentences.chinese: 冰川使许多大石块移位了。

sentences.english: A river or glacier debouches on the plains.
sentences.chinese: 一条河流或冰川流向平原。

detailed_translations.english: a large mass of ice which moves slowly down a mountain valley

name: groundwater
trans: n. 地下水 n. (Groundwater)人名；(英)格朗德沃特

sentences.english: There are fears that groundwater might become contaminated.
sentences.chinese: 有人担心地下水可能会遭污染。

detailed_translations.english: water that is below the ground

name: liquid
trans: adj. 液体的；清澈的；明亮的；易变的 n. 液体，流体；流音

sentences.english: Add a little more liquid to the sauce.
sentences.chinese: 在酱汁中再加一点水。

sentences.english: Children take antibiotics in liquid form.
sentences.chinese: 儿童服用液态抗生素。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that is not a solid or a gas, for example water or milk
in the form of a liquid instead of a gas or solid

name: precipitation
trans: n. [化学] 沉淀，[化学] 沉淀物；降水；冰雹；坠落；鲁莽

detailed_translations.chinese: [化学] 沉淀，[化学] 沉淀物；降水；冰雹；坠落；鲁莽
detailed_translations.english: rain, snow etc that falls on the ground, or the amount of rain, snow etc that falls

name: solid
trans: adj. 固体的；可靠的；立体的；结实的；一致的 n. 固体；立方体 n. (Solid)人名；(瑞典)索利德

sentences.english: The lake was frozen solid .
sentences.chinese: 湖水冻得结结实实。

sentences.english: It was good to be back on solid ground again.
sentences.chinese: 又能踏上坚实的土地感觉真好。

sentences.english: Is the baby eating solid food (= bread, meat etc ) yet?
sentences.chinese: 宝宝吃固体食物了吗？

sentences.english: The ship’s sonar can detect the presence of solid objects in the water.
sentences.chinese: 船上的声呐能够探测出水中的固体物。

sentences.english: the properties of liquids and solids
sentences.chinese: 液体和固体的特性

detailed_translations.english: hard or firm, with a fixed shape, and not a liquid or gas
a firm object or substance that has a fixed shape, not a gas or liquid

name: herbivore
trans: n. [动] 食草动物

sentences.english: The meat of the herbivore is, in comparison, far more edible , smellwise.
sentences.chinese: 相对地，食草动物的肉闻起来要好些，更易食用。

sentences.english: I only eat vegetables (scientists call me a herbivore) -- almost always leaves from the tops of trees.
sentences.chinese: 我只吃蔬菜(科学家称我为草食动物)—几乎常常是树梢的叶子。

sentences.english: You probably would call me a vegetarian. But scientists call me a herbivore because I only eat leaves, grass and other plants.
sentences.chinese: 可能你会说我是素食者，但科学家称我为草食动物，因为我只吃叶子、草和其它植物。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that only eats plants

name: matriarch
trans: n. 女家长；女统治者；女负责人；受人尊敬的妇女

detailed_translations.chinese: 女家长；女统治者；女负责人；受人尊敬的妇女
detailed_translations.english: a woman, especially an older woman, who controls a family or a social group

name: mineral
trans: n. 矿物；（英）矿泉水；无机物；苏打水（常用复数表示） adj. 矿物的；矿质的

sentences.english: The area is very rich in minerals .
sentences.chinese: 该地区矿产非常丰富。

sentences.english: a country with few mineral resources
sentences.chinese: 矿产资源稀少的国家

sentences.english: mineral water
sentences.chinese: 矿泉水

detailed_translations.english: a substance that is formed naturally in the earth, such as coal, salt, stone, or gold. Minerals can be dug out of the ground and used
of or containing or derived from minerals

name: route
trans: n. 路线，航线；道路，公路；（交通工具的）固定路线；巡访；途径，渠道；（北美）递送路线；用于美国干线公路号码前 v. 按特定路线发送，为……规定路线

sentences.english: Trains are taking a lot of freight that used to be routed via trucks.
sentences.chinese: 火车正在运送过去由卡车运送的大批货物。

detailed_translations.english: to send something somewhere using a particular route
a way from one place to another

name: boil
trans: v. 煮沸，（使）沸腾，达到沸点；用沸水煮或烫洗；对……施以烹刑；翻腾；发火 n. 沸点，沸腾；激昂；疖，皮下脓肿；突然浮上来食鱼饵 n. (Boil) （美）博伊尔（人名）

sentences.english: Put the spaghetti into plenty of boiling salted water.
sentences.chinese: 把意大利面放入大量煮沸的盐水中。

sentences.english: We were advised to boil the water before drinking it.
sentences.chinese: 有人建议我们把这水烧开后再喝。

detailed_translations.english: when a liquid boils, or when you boil it, it becomes hot enough to turn into gas
the act or state of boiling

name: emperor
trans: n. 皇帝，君主

sentences.english: They  bowed before the emperor as he entered the court.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝进入朝廷时他们都向他鞠躬致敬。

sentences.english: The daughter of an emperor does not worry about finding a husband.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝女儿不愁嫁。

sentences.english: The old chancellor who had offended against the emperor was relegated to the distant boundaries of the country.
sentences.chinese: 触犯了皇帝的老宰相被流放到遥远的边疆。

detailed_translations.english: the man who is the ruler of an empire

name: honest
trans: adj. 诚实的，实在的；可靠的；坦率的

sentences.english: He was a hard-working, honest man.
sentences.chinese: 他勤奋老实。

sentences.english: Ann had an honest face.
sentences.chinese: 安有一张诚实的面孔。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is honest always tells the truth and does not cheat or steal

name: quality
trans: n. 质量，[统计] 品质；特性；才能 adj. 优质的；高品质的；棒极了

sentences.english: Much of the land was of poor quality.
sentences.chinese: 很多地的土质很差。

sentences.english: Use only high quality ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 只使用上等的材料。

sentences.english: the drug’s addictive quality
sentences.chinese: 毒品令人上瘾的特性

detailed_translations.english: how good or bad something is

name: sprout
trans: vi. 发芽；长芽 vt. 使发芽；使萌芽 n. 芽；萌芽；苗芽 n. (Sprout)人名；(英)斯普劳特

sentences.english: Move the pots outside when the seeds begin to sprout.
sentences.chinese: 种子开始发芽时把盆搬到外面去。

sentences.english: Trees were starting to sprout new leaves.
sentences.chinese: 树上开始抽出新叶。

detailed_translations.english: if vegetables, seeds, or plants sprout, they start to grow, producing  shoots  ,  buds  , or leaves
a small green vegetable like a very small  cabbage

name: weep
trans: v. 哭泣，流泪；哭着说；哀悼；渗出（液体） n. 哭泣，落泪

sentences.english: James broke down and wept.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯控制不住感情，哭了起来。

sentences.english: He wept bitterly (= cried a lot ) when it was time for us to leave.
sentences.chinese: 我们要分别的时候他痛哭了一场。

detailed_translations.english: to cry, especially because you feel very sad

name: approve
trans: vt. 批准；赞成；为…提供证据 vi. 批准；赞成；满意

sentences.english: You've never approved of Henry, have you?
sentences.chinese: 你从未赞赏过亨利，是吧？

detailed_translations.english: to think that someone or something is good, right, or suitable

name: cabinet
trans: n. 内阁；橱柜；展览艺术品的小陈列室 adj. 内阁的；私下的，秘密的

sentences.english: The President chose loyal supporters to serve in his cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 总统选择了忠诚的支持者到他的内阁服务。

sentences.english: Every year we used the State of the Union as an organizing tool for the cabinet and staff to come up with new policy ideas, and then we worked hard on how best to present them.
sentences.chinese: 每年国情咨文都被内阁和幕僚们作为我们提出新政策思路的一个组织工具，然后我们努力下功夫，让它们以最佳方式呈现在人们面前。

detailed_translations.english: the politicians with important positions in a government who meet to make decisions or advise the leader of the government

name: Constitution
trans: n. 宪法；体制；章程；构造；建立，组成；体格

name: election
trans: n. 选举；当选；选择权；上帝的选拔

sentences.english: The Labour Party won the 2001 election by a huge majority.
sentences.chinese: 工党在2001年选举中以巨大优势获胜。

sentences.english: Elections for the state governorship will be on November 25.
sentences.chinese: 州长选举将于11月25日举行。

detailed_translations.english: when people vote to choose someone for an official position

name: executive
trans: adj. 经营管理的；有执行权的；高级的；供重要人物使用的 n. 主管；行政领导；（政府的）行政部门；执行委员会

sentences.english: a commission with executive powers
sentences.chinese: 有执行权的委员会

detailed_translations.english: relating to the job of managing a business or organization and making decisions
a group of people who are in charge of an organization and make the rules

name: veto
trans: n. 否决权 vt. 否决；禁止 vi. 否决；禁止

sentences.english: The Senate had a sufficient majority to override the presidential veto (= not accept his refusal ).
sentences.chinese: 参议院有足够的多数票可以推翻总统的否决。

detailed_translations.english: a refusal to give official permission for something, or the right to refuse to give such permission
if someone in authority vetoes something, they refuse to allow it to happen, especially something that other people or organizations have agreed

name: creature
trans: n. 动物，生物；人；创造物

sentences.english: all the living creatures in the sea
sentences.chinese: 海洋中所有的生物

detailed_translations.english: anything that is living, such as an animal, fish, or insect, but not a plant

name: extreme
trans: adj. 极端的；极度的；偏激的；尽头的 n. 极端；末端；最大程度；极端的事物

sentences.english: Extreme poverty still exists in many rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 许多农村地区仍处于赤贫状态。

sentences.english: extreme cold
sentences.chinese: 严寒

sentences.english: He had extreme difficulty getting hold of the ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 他费了极大的劲找配料。

detailed_translations.english: very great in degree
a situation, quality etc which is as great as it can possibly be – used especially when talking about two opposites

name: mammal
trans: n. [脊椎] 哺乳动物

sentences.english: A whale is a kind of mammal.
sentences.chinese: 鲸是一种哺乳动物。

sentences.english: The whale is a mammal.
sentences.chinese: 鲸鱼是哺乳动物。

sentences.english: The problem with that theory is that no other mammal has resorted to this method of cooling down.
sentences.chinese: 这一理论的问题在于，没有其他的哺乳动物采取了这种降低体温的方式。

detailed_translations.english: a type of animal that drinks milk from its mother’s body when it is young. Humans, dogs, and whales are mammals.

name: quiet
trans: adj. 安静的；安定的；不动的；温顺的 n. 安静；和平 vt. 使平息；安慰 vi. 平静下来

sentences.english: We’ll have to be quiet so as not to wake the baby.
sentences.chinese: 我们得安静点，免得吵醒宝宝。

sentences.english: It’s a nice car. The engine’s really quiet.
sentences.chinese: 这车真好，发动机声音很小。

sentences.english: I’ll be as quiet as a mouse (= very quiet ).
sentences.chinese: 我会像老鼠一样悄无声息的。

sentences.english: It was a Sunday, about three o’clock, and the streets were quiet.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个星期天，三点钟左右，街上一片寂静。

detailed_translations.english: not making much noise, or making no noise at all

name: remarkable
trans: adj. 卓越的；非凡的；值得注意的

sentences.english: She has made remarkable progress.
sentences.chinese: 她取得了显著的进步。

sentences.english: a remarkable coincidence
sentences.chinese: 不寻常的巧合

sentences.english: He’s a remarkable man .
sentences.chinese: 他是个了不起的人。

detailed_translations.english: unusual or surprising and therefore deserving attention or praise

name: reptile
trans: n. 爬行动物；（非正式）卑鄙的人 adj. 爬行动物的；卑鄙的

sentences.english: Bird evolved from reptiles, so the first bird must have come out of an egg--laid by a reptile.
sentences.chinese: 禽类是由爬虫类进化而来，所以，第一只禽鸟肯定是从爬虫类孵化的蛋里出来的。

sentences.english: No matter how dry your skin gets, you will never turn into an alligator or any other type of reptile.
sentences.chinese: 不论皮肤多么干燥，你永远不会变成美洲鳄或任何其他一种皮肤粗糙的爬行动物。

sentences.english: This small reptile, which measures just 10 centimeters long, can swim through the sand dunes at up to 15 centimeters per second.
sentences.chinese: 这种身长只有10厘米小型爬行动物，可以在沙子中以最快每秒15厘米的速度游动。

detailed_translations.english: a type of animal, such as a snake or  lizard  , whose body temperature changes according to the temperature around it, and that usually lays eggs to have babies

name: determined
trans: adj. 决定了的；坚决的 v. 决定；断定（determine的过去分词）

sentences.english: Gwen is a very determined woman.
sentences.chinese: 格温是个意志很坚定的女性。

detailed_translations.english: having a strong desire to do something, so that you will not let anyone stop you

name: enormous
trans: adj. 庞大的，巨大的；凶暴的，极恶的

sentences.english: an enormous bunch of flowers
sentences.chinese: 巨大的花束

sentences.english: an enormous amount of money
sentences.chinese: 巨款

sentences.english: The team made an enormous effort.
sentences.chinese: 该队付出了巨大的努力。

detailed_translations.english: very big in size or in amount

name: fishing
trans: n. 渔业；捕鱼（术）；试探；装配 adj. 钓鱼的；钓鱼用的 v. 捕鱼（fish的ing形式）

sentences.english: Fishing is one of his hobbies.
sentences.chinese: 钓鱼是他的一项业余爱好。

sentences.english: Terry’s going fishing at Lake Arrowhead next weekend.
sentences.chinese: 特里下周末要到阿罗黑德湖钓鱼。

detailed_translations.english: the sport or business of catching fish

name: perch
trans: n. 鲈鱼; 高位；栖木；杆 vt. 栖息；就位；位于；使坐落于 vi. 栖息；就位；位于 n. (Perch)人名；(俄)佩尔奇；(丹)佩克

sentences.english: She watched the parade from her perch on her father’s shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 她骑在父亲的肩上观看游行。

sentences.english: ...the vast slums that perch precariously on top of the hills around which the city was built.
sentences.chinese: …摇摇欲坠地坐落于城市中心群山之顶的大片贫民窟。

detailed_translations.english: a branch or stick where a bird sits

detailed_translations.chinese: 栖息；就位；位于；使坐落于
detailed_translations.english: To perch somewhere means to be on the top or edge of something

name: secret
trans: adj. 秘密的，机密的；不公开的；善于掩饰自己的 n. 秘密，机密；秘诀；奥秘；默祷 n. (Secret) （法）塞克雷（人名）

sentences.english: I can’t tell you. It’s a secret.
sentences.chinese: 我不能告诉你，这是个秘密。

sentences.english: It was no secret that the two men hated each other.
sentences.chinese: 这两个男人相互仇视，这算不得什么秘密。

sentences.english: Don’t worry. Your secret is safe with me (= I won’t tell anyone about it ) .
sentences.chinese: 别担心，我会替你保守秘密。

sentences.english: Your hair always looks so great – what’s your secret ?
sentences.chinese: 你的头发看起来总是很漂亮——你的秘诀是什么？

sentences.english: They kept their relationship secret from their parents.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩的关系瞒着父母。

detailed_translations.english: something that is kept hidden or that is known about by only a few people
known about by only a few people and kept hidden from others

name: ability
trans: n. 能力，能耐；才能

sentences.english: the ability to walk
sentences.chinese: 行走的能力

sentences.english: The test measures your mathematical ability.
sentences.chinese: 这种测试考查的是数学能力。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being able to do something

name: China
trans: n. 瓷器 adj. 瓷制的 n. (China) 中国 adj. (China) 中国的

detailed_translations.english: the People's Republic of China

name: greedy
trans: adj. 贪婪的；贪吃的；渴望的

sentences.english: a greedy and selfish society
sentences.chinese: 一个贪婪自私的社会

sentences.english: He looked at the gold with greedy eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他贪婪地看着这些金子。

sentences.english: Have you eaten them all, you greedy pig?
sentences.chinese: 你把那些全吃了？你这贪吃的猪！

detailed_translations.english: always wanting more food, money, power, possessions etc than you need

name: magistrate
trans: n. 地方法官；文职官员；治安推事

sentences.english: She will face a local magistrate on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 她将在星期二面见一位地方治安法官。

detailed_translations.english: someone, not usually a lawyer, who works as a judge in a local court of law, dealing with less serious crimes

name: task
trans: n. （困难的）任务，工作；（语言教学中的）活动 v. 派给某人（任务）；对（手段或能力）要求极高

sentences.english: Sara had the task of preparing the agenda for meetings.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉的任务是准备会议议程。

sentences.english: I was given the task of building a fire.
sentences.chinese: 我分配到生火的任务。

sentences.english: the skills required to carry out these tasks
sentences.chinese: 执行这些任务所需要的技能

sentences.english: He soon realized the scale of the task he had undertaken .
sentences.chinese: 他很快就意识到他所承担任务的艰巨性了。

sentences.english: Our first task is to gather information.
sentences.chinese: 我们的首要任务是收集信息。

sentences.english: Monkeys can be taught to do simple tasks .
sentences.chinese: 猴子能被教会做一些简单的事。

sentences.english: They have the unenviable task of supervising the most dangerous prison in the country.
sentences.chinese: 他们有个令人头疼的工作，就是管理国家最危险的监狱。

sentences.english: Volunteers had the thankless task of distributing campaign leaflets.
sentences.chinese: 志愿者的任务是分发活动传单，吃力不讨好。

sentences.english: Trying to bring up a small daughter on your own is no easy task .
sentences.chinese: 独自抚养年幼的女儿不是件轻而易举的事。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that must be done, especially one that is difficult or unpleasant or that must be done regularly

name: delta
trans: n. （河流的）三角洲；德耳塔（希腊字母的第四个字） n. (Delta)人名；(英、罗、葡)德尔塔

sentences.english: the Nile delta
sentences.chinese: 尼罗河三角洲

detailed_translations.chinese: （河流的）三角洲；德耳塔（希腊字母的第四个字）
detailed_translations.english: the fourth letter of the Greek alphabet

name: floodplain
trans: n. 泛滥平原

sentences.english: Adgantole was a sour-smelling, dusty village beside the Awash River floodplain.
sentences.chinese: 阿甘图尔一处闻起来有些酸臭到处都是灰尘的村庄，就坐落在阿瓦什河的泛滥平原上。

sentences.english: It sprawled across thousands of square kilometres of floodplain where the Euphrates and Tigris rivers divided into a network of tributaries meandering and pulsating south to the Arabian sea.
sentences.chinese: 在幼发拉底河与底格里斯河径分为向南入血脉搏动流入阿拉伯海的蜿蜒河网处，泛滥平原地貌绵延了数千平方公里。

name: pollute
trans: vt. 污染；玷污；败坏

sentences.english: beaches polluted by raw sewage
sentences.chinese: 受未经处理的污水污染的海滩

sentences.english: The factory pollutes the air and water.
sentences.chinese: 那家工厂污染了空气和水。

detailed_translations.english: to make air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty and not suitable for people to use

name: sediment
trans: n. 沉积；沉淀物

sentences.english: a thick layer of sediment
sentences.chinese: 一层厚厚的沉积物

detailed_translations.english: solid substances that settle at the bottom of a liquid

name: aquarium
trans: n. 水族馆；养鱼缸；水族箱

sentences.english: We saw a ray at the aquarium.
sentences.chinese: 我们在水族馆看见了一只鳐。

sentences.english: In Amsterdam the girls all stand in the windows shimmering as tantalising as tropical fish beyond the gleam of aquarium glass.
sentences.chinese: 在阿姆斯特丹，姑娘们都站在窗后，光芒四射柔情撩人宛如水族馆玻璃背后脉脉含情的热带鱼。

sentences.english: Recently the bakers created an octopus complete with tentacles and suckers for a charity event held for a local aquarium.
sentences.chinese: 最近，面包师为当地水族馆举行的慈善活动制作了这只章鱼，它拥有完整的触手和吸盘。

detailed_translations.english: a clear glass or plastic container for fish and other water animals

name: formal
trans: adj. 正式的；拘谨的；有条理的 n. 正式的社交活动；夜礼服 n. (Formal)人名；(法)福马尔

sentences.english: formal recognition of the reformed church
sentences.chinese: 改革后的教会所获得的官方承认

sentences.english: a formal agreement between the countries
sentences.chinese: 两国间的正式协议

sentences.english: There is no formal structure for negotiating pay increases.
sentences.chinese: 加薪谈判没有正式的框架可循。

detailed_translations.english: made or done officially or publicly

name: ping-pong
trans: n. 乒乓球；桌球（等于 table tennis） v. 移动；跳跃

sentences.english: Would you consider ping-pong an outdoor sport?
sentences.chinese: 你认为乒乓球是一项户外运动吗？

sentences.english: But it could also have another application: electron ping-pong.
sentences.chinese: 不过它也有另一项用途：电子乒乓球。

sentences.english: She is a great ping-pong player.
sentences.chinese: 她是一个优秀的乒乓球运动员。

detailed_translations.english: Ping-Pong is the game of

name: porridge
trans: n. 粥，糊；麦片粥 vt. 服刑

sentences.english: I'll pass on the fried potato crisp, but take the porridge.
sentences.chinese: 炸土豆片我不吃了，粥还是要喝的。

detailed_translations.english: oats  that are cooked with milk or water and served hot for breakfast

name: similar
trans: adj. 相似的 n. 类似物

sentences.english: We have similar tastes in music.
sentences.chinese: 我们对音乐的品位相近。

sentences.english: Both approaches seem to achieve similar results.
sentences.chinese: 两种方法都得出了相似的结果。

sentences.english: A number of his friends had been affected in a similar way .
sentences.chinese: 他的一些朋友也受到了类似的影响。

sentences.english: The two products look quite similar .
sentences.chinese: 这两种产品看上去很相似。

detailed_translations.english: almost the same

name: uniform
trans: adj. 统一的；一致的；相同的；均衡的；始终如一的 n. 制服 vt. 使穿制服；使成一样

sentences.english: Grade A eggs must be of uniform size.
sentences.chinese: A 级鸡蛋必须大小相同。

detailed_translations.chinese: 统一的；一致的；相同的；均衡的；始终如一的
detailed_translations.english: being the same in all its parts or among all its members
a particular type of clothing worn by all the members of a group or organization such as the police, the army etc

name: conflict
trans: n. 冲突，矛盾；斗争；争执 vi. 冲突，抵触；争执；战斗

sentences.english: the threat of industrial conflict in the coalfields
sentences.chinese: 煤田发生劳资纠纷的风险

sentences.english: Marx points out the potential conflicts below the surface of society.
sentences.chinese: 马克思指出了隐藏在社会表层之下的潜在矛盾。

sentences.english: His views on the literal truth of the Bible brought him into conflict with other Christian leaders.
sentences.chinese: 他坚持《圣经》字面真理的观点使他与其他的基督教领袖发生了冲突。

sentences.english: Doctors exercise considerable power and often come into conflict with politicians.
sentences.chinese: 医生行使很大的权力，常常和政客们发生冲突。

sentences.english: a lawyer specializing in conflict resolution
sentences.chinese: 专门解决纠纷的律师

detailed_translations.english: a state of disagreement or argument between people, groups, countries etc

name: Hindu
trans: adj. (Hindu) 印度的；印度教的 n. (Hindu) 印度人；印度教教徒 n. (Hindu) （印、美、英、俄、加）欣杜（人名）

sentences.english: ...a Hindu temple.
sentences.chinese: …一座印度教寺庙。

detailed_translations.english: Hindu is used to describe things that belong or relate to Hinduism
someone whose religion is Hinduism

name: inspire
trans: vt. 激发；鼓舞；启示；产生；使生灵感

sentences.english: We need someone who can inspire the team.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一个能鼓舞团队士气的人。

sentences.english: Inspired by the sunny weather, I decided to explore the woods.
sentences.chinese: 阳光明媚的天气令人振奋，我决定到森林里寻幽探胜。

sentences.english: The story was inspired by a chance meeting with an old Russian duke.
sentences.chinese: 这个故事的创作灵感来自与一位俄国老公爵的不期而遇。

detailed_translations.english: to encourage someone by making them feel confident and eager to do something

name: Muslim
trans: n. 穆斯林；穆罕默德信徒 adj. 伊斯兰教的

sentences.english: ...Iran and other Muslim countries.
sentences.chinese: …伊朗和其他穆斯林国家。

detailed_translations.chinese: 穆斯林（的）；伊斯兰教信徒（的）
detailed_translations.english: someone whose religion is Islam

name: nonviolence
trans: n. 非暴力；非暴力事件

name: protest
trans: n. 抗议，反对；（多来自公证人）拒付证书 v. 抗议，反对；坚决表示，断言；拒付

sentences.english: ‘I don’t see why I should take the blame for this!’ she protested.
sentences.chinese: “我不明白为什么我要对此承担责任！”她抗议道。

detailed_translations.english: to come together to publicly express disapproval or opposition to something
something that you do to show publicly that you think that something is wrong and unfair, for example taking part in big public meetings, refusing to work, or refusing to buy a company’s products

name: erosion
trans: n. 侵蚀，腐蚀

sentences.english: the problem of soil erosion
sentences.chinese: 水土流失的问题

sentences.english: the erosion of the coastline
sentences.chinese: 海岸线受到的侵蚀

detailed_translations.english: the process by which rock or soil is gradually destroyed by wind, rain, or the sea

name: landscape
trans: n. 风景；风景画；景色；山水画；乡村风景画；地形；（文件的）横向打印格式 vt. 对…做景观美化，给…做园林美化；从事庭园设计 vi. 美化（环境等），使景色宜人；从事景观美化工作，做庭园设计师

sentences.english: the beauty of the New England landscape
sentences.chinese: 新英格兰风光之美

detailed_translations.english: an area of countryside or land of a particular type, used especially when talking about its appearance
to make a park, garden etc look attractive and interesting by changing its design, and by planting trees and bushes etc

name: marvel
trans: v. 感到惊奇（或好奇）；大为赞叹 n. 令人惊异的人（或事）；不平凡的成果，成就；奇迹；十分有用（灵巧）的物（人）；惊讶，惊奇 n. (Marvel) （美）马弗尔（人名）

sentences.english: ‘The man is a genius,’ marvelled Claire.
sentences.chinese: “这人是个天才。”克莱尔赞叹道。

sentences.english: The whale, like the dolphin, has become a symbol of the marvels of creation.
sentences.chinese: 鲸，和海豚一样，已经成为造物杰作的象征。

detailed_translations.english: to feel or express great surprise or admiration at something, especially someone’s behaviour
You can describe something or someone as a marvel to indicate that you think that they are wonderful

name: national park
trans: （美）国家公园

name: protected
trans: adj. 受保护的 v. 保护；防卫（protect的过去分词）

name: bundle
trans: n. 束；捆 vt. 捆 vi. 匆忙离开

sentences.english: a small bundle containing mostly clothing
sentences.chinese: 一个小包袱，里面主要是衣服

sentences.english: He was bundled into a car and driven 50 miles to a police station.
sentences.chinese: 他被塞进一辆小汽车，被带到50英里外的警察局。

detailed_translations.english: a group of things such as papers, clothes, or sticks that are fastened or tied together

detailed_translations.chinese: 收集， 归拢； 把…塞入
detailed_translations.english: If someone is bundled somewhere, someone pushes them there in a rough and hurried way

name: festival
trans: n. 节日；庆祝，纪念活动；欢乐 adj. 节日的，喜庆的；快乐的

sentences.english: the Swansea Festival of Music and the Arts
sentences.chinese: 斯旺西音乐艺术节

sentences.english: Christmas is one of the main festivals in the Christian Calendar.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节是基督教历的重大节日之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔电影、戏剧、音乐等的〕节，节庆，会演；节日
detailed_translations.english: an occasion when there are performances of many films, plays, pieces of music etc, usually happening in the same place every year

name: Islam
trans: n. 伊斯兰教 n. (Islam)人名；(阿拉伯、巴基、孟)伊斯兰

sentences.english: He converted to Islam at the age of 16.
sentences.chinese: 他在16岁时皈依了伊斯兰教。

detailed_translations.english: the Muslim religion, which was started by Muhammad and whose holy book is the Quran (Koran)

name: Mecca
trans: n. 麦加（沙特阿拉伯一座城市）；众人渴望去的地方

name: mosque
trans: n. 清真寺

sentences.english: Would you go to church or the synagogue or the mosque?
sentences.chinese: 你会去教堂，犹太教会，或者清真寺吗？

sentences.english: If there is to be a new city church, they argue, then why not a mosque?
sentences.chinese: 他们置疑说，如果要修建一个新的城市教堂为什么不能是座清真寺呢？

sentences.english: Tell the congregation of a church or mosque that existence is too vulgar an attribute to fasten onto their God, and they will brand you an atheist.
sentences.chinese: 告诉教堂或清真寺的会众们，存在，是强加在他们的上帝身上的一种过于庸俗的属性，他们将会指责你为无神论者。

detailed_translations.english: a building in which Muslims worship

name: alien

sentences.chinese: 他血液中的酒精含量是法定限度的两倍。

sentences.english: a pressure group that is campaigning to make cannabis legal

detailed_translations.english: if something is legal, you are allowed to do it or have to do it by law

name: isthmus

sentences.chinese: 某些植物起了风化作用的辅助作用。

trans: vt. 使麻痹；使瘫痪

sentences.chinese: 我想每个人都认同这些东西是值得的，但是我们中许多人尽管对目前处境不甚满意，仍然选择麻痹于内在的恐惧，停滞于安逸，保险的职位。

name: prey

sentences.english: a tiger stalking its prey
sentences.chinese: 潜行跟踪猎物的老虎

sentences.english: Cats prey on birds and mice.
sentences.chinese: 猫捕食鸟和老鼠。

(of an animal or a bird) to hunt and kill another animal for food

trans: n. [生物] 囊；液囊 n. (Sac)人名；(西)萨克

sentences.english: The lungs consist of millions of tiny air sacs.
sentences.chinese: 肺包含数百万个小肺泡。

name: venom
trans: n. 毒液；恶意 vt. 使有毒；放毒

sentences.chinese: 她的声音非常凶狠。

sentences.english: a look of pure venom
sentences.chinese: 恶毒的表情

detailed_translations.english: great anger or hatred

sentences.english: Sales staff get a generous mileage allowance or a company car.
sentences.chinese: 销售人员有优厚的里程补贴或者公司提供的专用汽车。

sentences.english: If you are entitled to sickness allowance, you must claim it from your employer.
sentences.chinese: 你如果有资格领取疾病津贴，必须向雇主申请索要。

detailed_translations.chinese: 津贴， 补贴； 零用钱

trans: n. 保险；保险费；保险契约；赔偿金

sentences.chinese: 你父亲购买了抵押借款保险。

sentences.chinese: 我看了前几集，但很快就失去了兴趣。

sentences.english: The last round of bidding aroused considerable interest.
sentences.chinese: 最后一轮竞价引起人们相当大的兴趣。

sentences.english: Our survey reveals a disturbing lack of interest in teacher training.
sentences.chinese: 我们的调查显示人们对教师培训失去了兴趣，这很令人不安。

sentences.english: I read your article with great interest.
sentences.chinese: 我兴致勃勃地拜读了您的文章。

sentences.english: to promote/protect/safeguard sb's interests

sentences.english: The money was repaid with interest.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱是带息偿还的。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that you have when you want to know or learn more about sb/sth

name: purchase

sentences.chinese: 她付钱买好东西离开了。

sentences.chinese: 她从我的货摊上买了两样东西。

sentences.english: You can purchase insurance online.

detailed_translations.english: something you buy, or the act of buying it
to buy something

sentences.english: a vinaigrette dressing
sentences.chinese: 醋油调味料

给…穿衣；为…打扮（dress的现在分词）

sentences.chinese: 该活动将以吃一顿百家饭启动。

sentences.chinese: 如果他们顺访这里，我就做一个大杂烩当晚饭。

detailed_translations.english: A potluck is a meal that consists of food brought by the people who come to the meal, or a meal that consists of whatever food happens to be available without special preparation

sentences.chinese: 如果食品不能运到那座城市，成千上万的人就要饿死。

sentences.chinese: 饥饿儿童的照片

sentences.chinese: 他们要么会冻死，要么会饿死。

sentences.chinese: 他说有时候他们也会邀请一些朋友来一起分享感恩节快乐。

sentences.english: I hear about these people every Thanksgiving, then never think about them again for the next 364 days.
sentences.chinese: 我在每个感恩节都听说过这群人，而后在接下来的364天，就再也没有想起过他们。

sentences.chinese: 它与“网络星期一”在美国，感恩节后的第一天销售作为一个大型网上购物一天。

name: vegetarian
trans: n. 素食主义者；食草动物 adj. 素食的；素的

sentences.chinese: 我们的小女儿是个素食主义者。

sentences.english: dishes suitable for vegetarians
sentences.chinese: 适合素食者的菜肴

sentences.chinese: 我在考虑戒除荤食。

sentences.english: Yasmin sticks to a strict vegetarian diet.
sentences.chinese: 亚斯敏坚持一种严格的纯素饮食。

sentences.english: cake decorations
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕上的裱花

sentences.chinese: 其实她是一个考古学家。

sentences.english: But I do not believe, as a field archaeologist, that we can use the scientific method to prove or disprove [them].
sentences.chinese: 但作为一个在现场工作的考古学家，我不相信我们能用科学手段对它们进行证实或证伪”。

sentences.chinese: …一位瑜伽专家。

sentences.chinese: 袋鼠身上有各种各样的寄生虫。

sentences.chinese: 别忘记给植物浇水。

sentences.english: the burial of solid waste

sentences.chinese: 什么棺材？

sentences.chinese: 有高高的塔楼的城堡

name: equality

sentences.english: ...equality of the sexes.
sentences.chinese: …性别平等。

detailed_translations.chinese: 等同； 平等； 相等

trans: n. 切肉刀；雕刻者；切肉的人 n. (Carver)人名；(英)卡弗

sentences.chinese: 坎贝尔家族

sentences.english: warring clans
sentences.chinese: 交战的各氏族

sentences.chinese: 羽冠鲜艳多彩的珍禽

detailed_translations.english: the top or highest point of something such as a hill or a wave

name: security
trans: n. 安全，安全性；保证；证券；抵押品 adj. 安全的；保安的；保密的

sentences.english: The trial was held under tight security .
sentences.chinese: 这场审讯是在戒备森严的情况下进行的。

sentences.chinese: 登机手续柜台松懈的安全措施

sentences.english: terrorist activity that is a threat to national security
sentences.chinese: 威胁国家安全的恐怖活动

sentences.chinese: 昨天一名囚犯越狱后，该监狱被勒令加强安全措施。

sentences.chinese: 天花板很高的房间

sentences.chinese: 吊在天花板上的灯

sentences.chinese: 他先吹了吹汤，然后出声地从匙子里喝汤。

detailed_translations.english: to drink a liquid while making a noisy sucking sound

name: ancient
trans: adj. 古代的；古老的，过时的；年老的 n. 古代人；老人

sentences.english: the ancient civilizations of Asia
sentences.chinese: 亚洲的古代文明

sentences.english: an ancient walled city
sentences.chinese: 有城墙的古城

detailed_translations.english: belonging to a time long ago in history, especially thousands of years ago

name: plaster
trans: n. 石膏；灰泥；膏药 vt. 减轻；粘贴；涂以灰泥；敷以膏药；使平服 n. (Plaster)人名；(英、德)普拉斯特

sentences.english: She gets sunburned even when she plasters herself from head to toe in factor 7 sun lotion.
sentences.chinese: 即使她从头到脚涂抹上防晒系数是7的防晒霜，她也会被晒伤。

detailed_translations.english: a substance used to cover walls and ceilings with a smooth even surface. It consists of  lime  , water, and sand.

detailed_translations.chinese: 减轻；粘贴；涂以灰泥；敷以膏药；使平服
detailed_translations.english: If you plaster yourself in some kind of sticky substance, you cover yourself in it

name: beak
trans: n. [鸟] 鸟嘴；鹰钩鼻子；地方执法官；男教师 n. (Beak)人名；(英、西)比克

sentences.english: ...a black bird with a yellow beak.
sentences.chinese: …一只有着黄喙的黑鸟。

detailed_translations.english: the hard pointed mouth of a bird

name: extinct
trans: adj. 灭绝的，绝种的；熄灭的 vt. 使熄灭

sentences.english: Dinosaurs have been extinct for millions of years.
sentences.chinese: 恐龙已灭绝数千万年了。

sentences.english: Pandas could become extinct in the wild.
sentences.chinese: 熊猫在野生环境中可能会绝种。

sentences.english: an extinct species
sentences.chinese: 已灭绝的一个物种

detailed_translations.english: (of a type of plant, animal, etc.) no longer in existence

name: horn
trans: n. 喇叭，号角；角 vt. 装角于 n. (Horn)人名；(英、德、匈、捷、罗、波、芬、希、瑞典)霍恩；(法)奥尔恩；(柬)洪

sentences.english: A mature cow has horns.
sentences.chinese: 成年母牛头上长有角。

detailed_translations.english: a container in the shape of an animal’s horn, used in the past for drinking from, carrying  gunpowder  etc

name: shellfish
trans: n. 甲壳类动物；贝类等有壳的水生动物

sentences.english: Fish and shellfish are the specialties.
sentences.chinese: 鱼和甲壳类水生动物是特产。

detailed_translations.chinese: 甲壳类动物；贝类等有壳的水生动物
detailed_translations.english: an animal that lives in water, has a shell, and can be eaten as food, for example  crab s  ,  lobster s  , and  oyster s

name: weird
trans: adj. 怪异的；不可思议的；超自然的 n. （苏格兰）命运；预言

sentences.english: A really weird thing happened last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚发生了一件非常奇怪的事。

sentences.english: He’s a weird bloke.
sentences.chinese: 他是个古怪的家伙。

sentences.english: They sell all sorts of weird and wonderful (= very strange ) products.
sentences.chinese: 他们出售各种稀奇古怪的产品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 古怪的， 离奇的； 怪诞的， 神秘而可怕的
detailed_translations.english: very strange and unusual, and difficult to understand or explain

name: builder
trans: n. 建筑者；建立者

sentences.english: The builders have finished the roof.
sentences.chinese: 建筑工人们已经完成了屋顶的建造。

detailed_translations.english: a person or a company that builds or repairs buildings

name: burrow
trans: v. 挖地洞，挖通道；依偎；挖穿；钻入；（使）……钻到……下面；（在……里）搜寻；深入查询 n. （动物的，尤指兔子挖的）洞穴，地洞 n. (Burrow) （美）伯罗（人名）

sentences.english: Normally timid, they rarely stray far from their burrows.
sentences.chinese: 它们通常很胆小，极少远离自己的洞穴。

sentences.english: The larvae burrow into cracks in the floor.
sentences.chinese: 幼虫钻进地板的裂缝中。

detailed_translations.english: a passage in the ground made by an animal such as a rabbit or  fox  as a place to live
If an animal burrows into the ground or into a surface, it moves through it by making a tunnel or hole

name: cell
trans: n. 细胞；电池；蜂房的巢室；单人小室 vi. 住在牢房或小室中 n. (Cell)人名；(英)塞尔

sentences.english: cancer cells
sentences.chinese: 癌细胞

sentences.english: Embryos grow by cell division (= the splitting of cells ) .
sentences.chinese: 胚胎通过细胞分裂而成长。

detailed_translations.english: the smallest part of a living thing that can exist independently

name: predator
trans: n. [动] 捕食者；[动] 食肉动物；掠夺者

sentences.english: With no natural predators on the island, the herd increased rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 由于岛上没有天然食肉动物，牧群的数量迅速增加。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that kills and eats other animals

name: silk
trans: n. 丝绸；蚕丝；丝织物 adj. 丝的；丝绸的；丝制的 vi. （玉米）处于长须的阶段中 n. (Silk)人名；(英、瑞典)西尔克

sentences.english: pure silk stockings
sentences.chinese: 生丝面料的漂亮连衣裙

detailed_translations.english: a thin smooth soft cloth made from very thin thread which is produced by a silkworm

name: explorer
trans: n. 探险家；勘探者；探测器；[医]探针

sentences.english: ...the travels of Columbus, Magellan, and many other explorers.
sentences.chinese: …哥伦布、麦哲伦和许多其他探险家的旅行。

detailed_translations.english: someone who travels through an unknown area to find out about it

name: haven
trans: n. 保护区，避难所；港口 v. 为……提供避难所 n. (Haven) （美）黑文（人名）

sentences.english: ...Lake Baringo, a freshwater haven for a mixed variety of birds.
sentences.chinese: …百瑞高湖，一个适合各种鸟类的淡水栖息地。

detailed_translations.english: a place where people or animals can live peacefully or go to in order to be safe

detailed_translations.chinese: 为……提供避难处；安置……于港中

name: seep
trans: v. （液体）渗漏，渗透；逐渐移动，渐渐散开 n. （油、水）渗出地表的地方

sentences.english: Radioactive water had seeped into underground reservoirs.
sentences.chinese: 放射性水已渗入了地下蓄水池。

detailed_translations.english: to flow slowly through small holes or spaces

detailed_translations.chinese: 小泉；水陆两用的吉普车
